scripts.build:css:fonts: mkdir -p ./app/assets/builds/fonts && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/*.woff* ./app/assets/builds/fonts/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: Bootstrap Icons fonts not found, continuing...'
scripts.build:css:compile: SASS_PATH=node_modules:$(bundle exec ruby -e 'print Gem.loaded_specs["activeadmin"].full_gem_path + "/app/assets/stylesheets"') sass ./app/assets/stylesheets/application.bootstrap.scss:./app/assets/builds/application.bootstrap.css --no-source-map --quiet-deps && SASS_PATH=node_modules:$(bundle exec ruby -e 'print Gem.loaded_specs["activeadmin"].full_gem_path + "/app/assets/stylesheets"') sass ./app/assets/stylesheets/active_admin.scss:./app/assets/builds/active_admin.css --no-source-map --quiet-deps
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:fonts && npm run build:css:compile && npm run build:css:prefix
